data.text: @CollinetMarie Bonjour Marie, nous nous excusons pour la situation et toutes les contraintes causées. Si nous pouvons vous aider, veuillez nous envoyer, par message privé, le code de votre réservation ou le numéro du billet électronique. Merci.

@qrlucas Olá Lucas,
O número é o que indica o nosso website e confirmamos que o mesmo se encontra em funcionamento. No entanto, caso necessite de assistência, estamos igualmente disponíveis por esta via. Obrigada

@Luukapd92 Hello Luuk,
We have answered your private messages. Thank you

@PedroAl35449923 Olá Pedro, caso tenha comprado a sua viagem com uma agência de viagens (online ou física) terá de contactar a mesma para efetuar a sua alteração. Contudo, informamos que está autorizada a alteração sem penalidade e sem diferença tarifária. Obrigado

data.text: @VanjaVasiljkov1 For security reasons, we kindly request that you send us the information through a private message. Thank you (2/2)

@VanjaVasiljkov1 Hello Vanja,
We apologize for the situation and for the inconvenience caused by this. In order for us to be able to assist you, we kindly request that you send us a printscreen of the error you are getting and your email address. (1/2)

@elcalinperu Hello Juan,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.
@91_borja Por cuestión de seguridad, le pedimos que nos envié los datos pedidos, a través de un mensaje privado. Gracias por su comprensión. (2/2)

@91_borja Hola Borja,
Lamentamos la cuestión que nos indica. Para que nos sea posible verificar su cuestión, le pedimos que nos indique el código de su reclamo. (1/2)

@SteveLyall1 Hello Steve,
We apologize for all inconveniences caused by this situation. We have already replied to your private messages. Thank you

@sparklygemster Hello Gemma,
please provide us the booking reference via DM in order to verify. Thank you.
@delossof Hemos internamente encaminado su cuestión para que sea verificada. Le pedimos así que aguarde ese contacto, por favor. Gracias (2/2)

@delossof Hola Nolefan,
Hemos verificado su cuestión y informamos que, su reclamo sigue bajo análisis y recibirá respuesta del departamento de atención al cliente lo antes posible. (1/2)

@matilionis Hello matilionis,
please provide us the booking reference via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@Yasmiongaratox Olá Yasmin,
pedimos que nos indique o código da reserva através de mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@Xerzoz Hello Axraf, we have replied via DM. Thank you.
@Leorochamm Olá detoxegratidão, como podemos ajudar por esta via? Obrigado.

@icylikeice Hello Mika,
our apologies for the waiting.
We have replied to your private message.
Thank you.

@JeanHe15 Hello Jeanhe15,
We kindly request you to provide us your email address, the booking reference and the claims file number.
For confidential reasons, we suggest you to send this information through DM.
Thank you.

data.text:
@AimiMcNeill @ManchesterAirp @AirlineDispute @UK_CAA @KatieMorley_ Hello Aimi,
once again, please accept our sincere apologies for the waiting. Our teams are handling your case and it may take longer depending on the complexity of the complaint. Rest assured you will be contacted as soon as possible. (1/2)

@elchiicosuave Hello Chico,
We regret to hear that your experience did not meet your expectations. We hope that we will be able to better assist you in the future.
In the meantime, if there is anything else we can help you with, please let us know.
Thank you for your understanding.
@aleamam1 Olá Alessandra, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@RobertaRab For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. 
Thank you. (2/2)

@joaomvfsantos Qualquer outra questão/situação em que possamos ajudar através deste canal, por favor indique-nos.
Obrigado. (2/2)

@LinaLeaner Hello Lina, we apologize for the late resolution of your file. We inform you that the situation has been reinforced and that you will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

@noorghdr Hello Noor, we inform you that, if you are Star Alliance Gold, you can transport for free one checked-in luggage up to 23 kg, even if the fare of your ticket is TAP|Discount. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text:
@JeanHe15 Hello Jean,

We understand your situation. You may fill a complaint form through the link https://t.co/3nTBK2Z5lc . After the form filled, we kindly ask you to wait for our Customer Service's feedback, in order to verify your case. Thank you

@daiane_rossi Olá Daiane,
respondemos através de mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@MarioHMB Olá Mário, qual o código de reserva ou número de bilhete eletrónico? Sugerimos os dados por mensagem privada por razões de confidencialidade. Obrigado.
@risquete Hola Jaume, lamentamos el retraso con su reclamación, estamos nuevamente verificando la situación y contestaremos vía email así que posible. Gracias
@MostafaToniHala Hi Mostafa&Toni, as we informed you before, your complaint is still under analysis, so we kindly ask you to wait for the reply by email. Thank you

@marianafnm Olá Mariana, de forma a verificar a situação, pedimos que nos indique o código da sua reserva ou o número do bilhete eletrónico. Por razões de segurança, solicitamos que nos envie a informação por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@rusyasurkova As we informed you before, your complaint will be verified and replied to as soon as possible. Thank you

@jacob262 @agneslepus @AeroportoLisboa Olá Marcos, lamentamos, mas não é possível contactarmos com a sua mãe, mas podemos verificar os voos que tem na reserva. Qual o código de reserva ou número de bilhete eletrónico? Sugerimos os dados por mensagem privada por razões de confidencialidade. Obrigado.
@Peter64621874 Hi Pete, can you please tell us your complaint number through DM? Thank you

@brancaIeone Olá Giu, lamentamos a situação que nos indica e todos os transtornos causados pelo mesmo. A reclamação 2022-0002885301 encontra-se em análise e será respondida o mais brevemente possível. Obrigado
@arianesconrad You're welcome Ariane, thank you for your contact. ✈️

@TheresaBrandon5 Hello Theresa,
We inform you that the voucher has been sent to the email address associated with the order.
In the meantime, if there is anything else we can help you with, please let us know.
Thank you for your understanding.
@Jessica52425735 @will_ainsley @rorycalland Hi Jessica, can you please tell us the complaint number? We suggest the details through DM. Thank you
@dmadrizl @KRZYSZTOF_UK Hi Dayana, please accept our apologies for the delay with your complaint. However, it will be verified and replied to as soon as possible. Thank you
@rorycalland Hello Rory, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@clarsinhaf Olá Clarisse, esteja atenta! 😉
@eigree Hi Eigree, as we informed you before your complaint will be replied to as soon as possible. Thank you
@Dori_Estirado Hola Dori, ¿cuál es el número de su reclamación por favor? Le pedimos los datos vía DM. Gracias
@pacodestroyer Hi Francisco, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.

data.text: @samifarris Olá Sami, o email que recebeu é falso, não tendo sido enviado pela TAP. Essa tentativa de phishing foi alertada pela TAP aos passageiros nas nossas páginas. Obrigado
@CarlosCarvaceou Hola, en ese momento no tenemos informaciones de la ruta de Santiago de Compostela en 2023. Gracias
@brunomporto Olá Bruno, trata-se de um email falso, cujo alerta na nossa página já foi dado anteriormente. Obrigado
@fenner_michael Hi Michael, you'll receive a reply as soon as possible. Thank you
@43fd0569223d4eb Hi Tony, the flight suffered a delay of 30 minutes due to operational reasons. Thank you
@rusyasurkova Hi Masha, we kindly ask you to try again, we had problems during the evening but they are now resolved. Thank you
@ernesto57748201 Hi Ernesto, within the flight is not necessary to use mask, but you must confirm the rules at the airport because they can be different. Thank you
@arianesconrad Hi Ariane, correct, however it's always necessary to verify your flight regularly. Thank you
@natashasandamas Hi Tash, you must make a complaint at our website adding the information and the photos of the bag. Again, we're sorry for all the distress caused. Thank you

urls.title: Cadeiras de rodas
urls.description: Assistência a passageiros com mobilidade reduzida. Garantimos apoio no aeroporto e até entrar no seu voo.

data.text: A TAP informa ainda que está em negociações com o sindicato dos tripulantes de cabina e espera que seja encontrado um entendimento que evite a greve.

Face ao pré aviso de greve do Pessoal de Cabina, a 8 e 9 de dezembro, a TAP informa que irá permitir que os clientes que desejem alterar as datas dos seus voos nesse período o façam sem qualquer penalização entre 28 de novembro e 19 de dezembro. https://t.co/azVftGMHsR
TAP also informs that it is in negotiations with the cabin crew union and hopes that an understanding can be found to avoid the strike.

In view of the prior notice of the cabin crew strike on the 8th and 9th of December, TAP informs that it will allow customers who wish to change the dates of their flights during this period to do so without any penalty between the 28th of November and the 19th of December. https://t.co/QLHyFt86K3
@gustockholm Olá, respondemos via DM. Obrigado.
@Daniell31978 Olá Danielle, respondemos via DM. Obrigado.
@pablo_shepherd Hello paul, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@carengoldberg66 Caren,
We have already sent a new DM regarding your second question.
@KRZYSZTOF_UK Hello Kryzstof, can you please provide us the booking reference? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.

@carengoldberg66 Hello Caren,
We have already replied to your DM.
@jangeissler We have replied by DM, Jan. Thank you.
@RimSarah We have replied by private message. Thank you.

@Comenta58118651 Hello Comentarista,

We sincerely apologize for the situation mentioned and the inconvenience caused. TAP Air Portugal works everyday in order to promote our passenger satisfaction and to improve our services. In case you require our assistance, please let us know. Thank you.

@YuriColombi Hello Yuri, we regret the discribed situation and inconvenience caused.
Let us know if we may be of further assistance through this channel, via private message. Thank you.

@Maggym2006 Olá MaggyM, informamos que o balcão de entrega de bagagem abre 2:30 antes da partida do voo.
Caso possamos ser úteis em qualquer outra questão, por favor, disponha. Obrigada.

@Lord_Rawl Hola 🔆Lоѓↁ Ɍawl🎮@lord_rawl, pedimos disculpas por el retraso en contestar.
Si aún necesita de asistencia por favor envíe-nos su código de reserva por mensaje privado. Gracias.
@ageekymom Lisa, can you please confirm the departure date? Thank you.

@smfood21 Hello Jay, we apologize for the delay and inform you that your case is not forgotten, however analysis and response delays are higher than desired.
We assure you that every effort is being made to complete all pending processes as quickly as possible. Thank you.
@jo_bartontaylor Hello Jo, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@HevMM01 Hello Heather, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
